mapper.select: select * from goods order by rand() limit #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into goods(category_id, goods_price, goods_discountRate, goods_saleUnit, goods_weight, goods_name, goods_detail, goods_delivery, goods_img, goods_reg, goods_state, goods_shortDesc, goods_shelfLife, goods_allergy, goods_info, goods_saleBegin, goods_saleEnd, goods_regDate ) values(#{category_id}, #{goods_price}, #{goods_discountRate}, #{goods_saleUnit}, #{goods_weight}, #{goods_name}, #{goods_detail}, #{goods_delivery}, #{goods_img}, #{goods_reg}, #{goods_state}, #{goods_shortDesc}, #{goods_shelfLife}, #{goods_allergy}, #{goods_info}, #{goods_saleBegin}, #{goods_saleEnd}, #{goods_regDate})
